member.name: IMFMediaTypeHandler.GetCurrentMediaType
member.summary: Retrieves the current media type of the object.
member.param: Receives a pointer to the interface. The caller must release the interface.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

member.name: IMFMediaTypeHandler.GetMajorType
member.summary: Gets the major media type of the object.
member.param: Receives a GUID that identifies the major type. For a list of possible values, see Major Media Types.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFMediaTypeHandler.GetMediaTypeByIndex
member.summary: Retrieves a media type from the object's list of supported media types.
member.param: Zero-based index of the media type to retrieve. To get the number of media types in the list, call .
Receives a pointer to the interface. The caller must release the interface.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

listheader.description: The dwIndex parameter is out of range.

member.name: IMFMediaTypeHandler.GetMediaTypeCount
member.summary: Retrieves the number of media types in the object's list of supported media types.
member.param: Receives the number of media types in the list.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFMediaTypeHandler.IsMediaTypeSupported
member.summary: Queries whether the object supports a specified media type.
member.param: Pointer to the interface of the media type to check.
Receives a pointer to the interface of the closest matching media type, or receives the value NULL. If non-NULL, the caller must release the interface. This parameter can be NULL. See Remarks.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

listheader.description: The object does not support this media type.

member.name: IMFMediaTypeHandler.SetCurrentMediaType
member.param: Pointer to the interface of the new media type.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

member.name: IMFMediaTypeHandler
member.summary: Gets and sets media types on an object, such as a media source or media sink.
